original_text: And they kept the Feast of Unleavened Bread seven days with joy, for the Lord had made them joyful and had turned the heart of the king of Assyria to them, so that he aided them in the work of the house of God, the God of Israel.
korean_text: 즐거움으로 이레 동안 무교절을 지켰으니 이는 여호와께서 그들을 즐겁게 하시고 또 앗수르 왕의 마음을 그들에게로 돌려 이스라엘의 하나님이신 하나님의 성전 건축하는 손을 힘 있게 하도록 하셨음이었더라

sentences.original_text: And they kept the Feast of Unleavened Bread
for the Lord had made them joyful
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 그들을 기쁘게 하셨기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and had turned the heart of the king of Assyria to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 앗수르 왕의 마음을 그들에게로 향하게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: so that he aided them in the work
of the house of God, the God of Israel.
